name: FOGA
description:
You find an old arcade machine and turn it on. There’s something wrong with the machine and multiple games have been mixed together. FOGA is a player versus game with four characters: Paddle, Invader, EAT-Man and Snake in four different levels.
Each level has different win conditions:

  • Tennis - Hit the ball, first to three wins.
  • Invaders - Kill 10 invaders and avoid getting hit by the laser.
  • EAT-Man - Eat 10 breadcrumbs as fast as possible.
  • Snake - Eat 5 delicates, and avoid the poisonous mushrooms.

Controls
PLAYER 1
MOVE: WASD
ACTION: SPACE

PLAYER 2
MOVE: ARROWS
ACTION: ENTER

INSERT COIN

Full round - Press § to play a full round of each version, for the balanced minded players!

Global game jam Entry: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/foga-6
